features: Head & Shoulders Classic Clean 2-in-1 anti-dandruff shampoo + conditioner fights flakes and provides balanced conditioning
body.description: Help say goodbye to flakes and hello to great hair with Head & Shoulders Classic Clean 2-in-1. It's from our original Classic Clean collection, formulated with HydraZinc to care for your scalp and leave you with soft, manageable, 100% flake-free1 hair. It's packed with seven benefits so you can live life with confidence. Head & ShouldersFor amazing, 100% flake-free1 hair, try our selection of Head & Shoulders products. Each is designed to deliver seven benefits for your hair and scalp, leaving your hair strong2 and looking great. With so many choices, you can find a new favorite every time you buy. Head & Shoulders for MenGet manly hair that's 100% flake free1 with the Head & Shoulders lineup for men. Whether you want to lock in your scalp's moisture, fight grease and gunk, restore fullness to thin-looking hair, or smell really handsome, you'll find the guy-specific benefits you need for great hair and scalp. It's Head & Shoulders, designed for men.Shop The Entire Collection1visible flakes; with regular use2strength against damage vs. non-conditioning shampoo3based on volume sales4vs. unwashed hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dandruff Relief with Extra Conditioning
reviews.reviewText: Head and Shoulders 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner has been a game-changer for my hair care routine. This product not only effectively tackles dandruff but also provides the added benefit of conditioning, leaving my hair feeling soft, smooth, and manageable.The dandruff-fighting formula of this 2 in 1 shampoo and conditioner is highly effective. It has significantly reduced the appearance of flakes and itching on my scalp, providing relief from dandruff-related discomfort.I appreciate the convenience of having both shampoo and conditioner in one bottle. The 2 in 1 feature saves time during my shower routine, making it perfect for busy mornings or when traveling.The formula lathers well, and a little goes a long way. It effortlessly cleanses my hair, removing excess oil and impurities, without over-drying or causing any irritation.The added conditioning benefits of this product are a pleasant surprise. After using the 2 in 1, my hair feels nourished and tangle-free, which makes styling much easier.The fresh and invigorating scent of the shampoo and conditioner is a bonus. It leaves my hair smelling great throughout the day.As someone who has struggled with dandruff and sensitive scalp, I can confidently say that Head and Shoulders 2 in 1 has been a life-saver. It has provided me with a simple yet effective solution to keep my hair and scalp healthy.The brand's reputation for producing high-quality hair care products is evident in this 2 in 1 formula. It is gentle enough for regular use and suitable for all hair types.In conclusion, Head and Shoulders 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner is a top-notch product for anyone looking to combat dandruff while maintaining smooth and conditioned hair. Its convenience, effectiveness, and pleasant scent make it a staple in my hair care routine. If you're seeking a reliable solution for dandruff control and extra conditioning, I highly recommend trying Head and Shoulders 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner. Embrace the confidence that comes with a healthy scalp and gorgeous hair, all in one easy-to-use product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best shampoo and smells great! It’s heavy since it’s a pack of two but this will definitely last for a few months. The smell stays in your hair for days even if you’re a cook at a restaurant or a construction worker regardless in what you work in the smell is long lasting in your hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ONE OF MY SONS LOVES THIS SHAMPOO
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo was recommended to one of my sons years ago. I don't think he had dandruff, but he wanted it and we got it for him. If he had dandruff, it took care of it. He has no flaking. He appreciates how it treats his hair. It smells nice. His friend did have dandruff, and it seems to have worked for his friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Head and Sholders seems like a reliable product
reviews.reviewText: Nothing much to say, Head and Shoulders has worked to curb Dandruff.Smells fine.Two pack cuts down on costs/time reordering.Good deal here if you have Dandruff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ordered on Dec. 28, 2023 & expiration date is Dec. 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells & works great, but would have been nice to know I was getting an expired item since it didn’t arrive til January 2024. I’m sure it will be fine and that’s probably why it was a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for dandruff
reviews.reviewText: Using the classic clean scent offered a fresh feel and scalp hydration. Got this to test out but would go for a pump one next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Name brand anti-dandruff shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: We buy this shampoo and conditioner mix not because we have dandruff but because it is easy on our scalps. I have dry skin and my wife gets it a bit during the summer. We use this all year round because it does a great job cleaning our hair (I work in a dirty shop) and keeps our scalps from being itchy. The sent is nice and the price is right, plus we can add it to our "Subscribe and save" which just makes it a win-win for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great great value
reviews.reviewText: Good dandruff scent is great bottle is great value is great
Bought this from Yuva Fashion, was shipped from NY and product is genuine and packaging was excellent, received the product on time. Happy with this purchase.

Head and shoulder is the only shampoo that I have been using since childhood. If I change any other shampoos , I suddenly got flakes and so itchy after 2 or 3 washes. This is a life saver. All of my itchiness and flakes go away. Recommended
Big sizes and I had a dandruff issue but ever since i used this product, my hair and scalp is doing great now! Glad i decided to use this product! it is effective
I got what I saw. I think I can use this for a long time. I haven’t started with the other one.
All fine with this product and seller.Faster parcel than expected.Happy.
